criteria.name: build_status_complete
criteria.description: build_status object present with at least phase_1 and phase_2 marked complete

criteria.name: endpoints_verified
criteria.description: endpoints array present with at least 1 healthy endpoint

criteria.name: spec_adherence
criteria.description: Implementation matches original project spec requirements

criteria.name: convergence_evidence
criteria.description: Notes or build_status show iteration/fix cycles (not single-shot)

criteria.name: elapsed_time_reasonable
criteria.description: Completed within the 2-hour build guard timeout

criteria.name: no_placeholders
criteria.description: No TODO, TBD, PLACEHOLDER in code or report
